name: Dovoul
content:
Dovoul was a male Besalisk, who lived on the planet Ryloth during the waning years of the Republic Classic era.
Dovoul worked in the Fungus Pit, a cantina that was located in the settlement of Bashka, on Ryloth. He was employed as a bouncer, along with the Besalisks Jebbis and Gatwer, and was armed with a stun baton. He was present in the cantina when it was attacked by the Gotal Noric Gestal and a group of slavers.
